title: Analyzing the Economic Effects of Cloud Computing: A Structural Equation Modeling-Based Educational Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistics, Fundamental Concepts of Business Information Systems (BIS), and Introduction to Cloud Computing
context.additional_context: A process for pre-service teachers to analyze real-world corporate cases and explore their applicability in educational settings

learning_goals: Learners will be able to analyze the economic impact of cloud computing on corporate performance using structural equation modeling (SEM) techniques.
Learners will be able to explain the complementary relationship between cloud computing and big data/machine learning with empirical data.
Learners will be able to comparatively evaluate differences in the economic effects of cloud technology based on company size (manufacturing/service industry, SME/large enterprise).

resources: Mobile-Optimized Statistical Analysis Tool (App-Based SEM Simulation)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
